methods.name: createListing
methods.desc: Creates a listing in the directory by vouching for an NFD root or segment of directory.algo

args.name: collateralPayment
args.desc: The Algo payment transaction of collateral to vouch for the listing

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The Application ID of the NFD that will be listed

args.name: listingTags
args.desc: An array of 13 bytes with each representing a tag for the listing

methods.name: refreshListing
methods.desc: Refreshes a listing in the directory and updates its last touched timestamp

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The Application ID of the NFD that will be refreshed

args.name: listingTags
args.desc: An array of 13 bytes with each representing a tag for the listing

methods.name: abandonListing
methods.desc: Abandons a listing in the directory and returns the vouched collateral

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The Application ID of the NFD that will be abandoned

methods.name: removeTransferredListing
methods.desc:
Removes a listing for which the NFD has been transferred.
Anyone can call this to clean up a listing that is no longer valid.

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The Application ID of the NFD that will be removed

methods.name: deleteListingWithPenalty
methods.desc: Deletes a listing from the directory & sends the collateral to the fee sink

args.name: nfdAppID
args.desc: The Application ID of the NFD that will be deleted

methods.name: setAdminToken
methods.desc: Stores an ASA ID in global state that will control administration rights

args.name: asaID
args.desc: The Asset ID of the ASA to be the admin token

methods.name: updateApplication
methods.desc: Enables the application to be updated by the creator
